Question: It marked the 11th straight season this person had thrown at least 20 TD passes, the 2nd longest streak ever.
Hints: In the Wild Card playoff round this person and the Colts defeated the Denver Broncos 41–10, his first playoff win.
This person finished the game with 225 yards passing, including a passing touchdown.
After another Rosenfels fumble, this person threw the 5-yard game-winning TD pass to Reggie Wayne.
